title: London scene
creator_credit: Central Office of Information and Frank Gardner
brief_description: A picture of life in London. Follows the course of a typical day: arrival of early-morning fruit and vegetables at Covent Garden; invasion of the City by a million workers from the suburbs; the parks of London, havens for office workers during lungh-time; diversity of shops and busy streets; the zoo; Crown Jewels in the Tower. After dark, the cry of “Time, gentlemen, please!” in the public hotels brings the day to a close.
